base_description: Rectangular cabinet, white, medium-sized, simple style.
part_description: Two doors with knobs at the bottom, two drawers above, rectangular shape, positioned symmetrically.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the top section, providing storage space. The doors open outward, revealing interior shelving for additional storage. The knobs facilitate easy opening and closing of both drawers and doors, ensuring smooth operation and accessibility.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet stands on the floor and can be placed against a wall. It interacts with users who open doors and drawers to store or retrieve items. It may also be positioned alongside other furniture, complementing room decor and providing functional storage.
